raw: for 10 best Gummer Academy field a 20 de O Mar. Self Myself. If you have not received the Money, please I don't bother yourself until it | Cames. Frusting you are in good health I remains Very sencerly yours, s. 6. Luk. | April fifteenth. My dear Mr Stearns : y have not seen you once since 9 left Andover this year. I received my father's letter a few days ago. He says, shat she Money for my expenses is on its way to you. Will you kindly tell me if it has reacher you. If the Money is on hand I would like to have you send me five dollars for

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter states that his father has sent money for expenses and asks, if the money has been received, to have $5 for his use.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
